patthana9.17:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana9.17:0.3_0: Next there are buds, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.
patthana9.17:1.1_0: if there is no Reciting for refuge to the teaching ...
patthana9.17:10.1_0: Not getting rid of desire for refuge to the teaching.
patthana9.17:11.1_0: You can endure each other with each other. ...
patthana9.17:11.1_1: winnowed the path to one end.
patthana9.17:11.1_2: (This should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
patthana9.17:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the giving rise to confidence.
patthana9.17:2.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the giving rise to confidence.
patthana9.17:2.1_2: doesn’t arise because of a refuge, nor a Recitation on the teachings.
patthana9.17:3.1_0: Not taking sides with a teaching on bed, nor a bench, the teaching, and the training.
patthana9.17:4.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
patthana9.17:5.1_0: if there is no Reciting for refuge to the teaching ...
patthana9.17:6.1_0: if there is no increase or decrease, no remaining in the teaching for the giving up of the teachings, not the cause or condition.
patthana9.17:6.1_1: if there is no increase or decrease, no remaining in the teaching for the giving up of the teachings, and not the increase of voice.
patthana9.17:6.1_2: doesn’t arise because of a refuge, nor a Recitation on the teachings.
patthana9.17:7.1_0: not for refuge to the teaching of the Teacher, the teaching, and the Saṅgha.
patthana9.17:8.1_0: for the sake of letting go, two results, together with the five results of deeds ...
patthana9.17:9.1_0: (These abbreviated texts should be expanded as in all.)
